metadata.title: CVE-2024-23791 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Insertion of debug information into log file during building the elasticsearch index allows reading of sensitive information from articles.Thisissue affects OTRS: from 7.0.X through 7.0.48, from 8.0.X through 8.0.37,from 2023.X through 2023.1.1.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
